name: The Commander
mission: Combine all dashboards using waterfall loading logic to produce the final unified assessment.

morning_brief.why_it_matters: AI analysis is currently unavailable, but core market data has been updated. Check individual dashboards for specific metrics.
morning_brief.cross_dashboard_convergence: Risk is LOW, Crypto is Neutral, and Strategy suggests Neutral.
morning_brief.optional_deep_insight: System is operating in data-only mode. All feeds are active.
morning_brief.summary_sentence: Data feeds active. AI synthesis pending next scheduled run.

internal_summary_sentence: Risk shows the environment, crypto shows sentiment, macro shows the wind, breakthroughs show the future, strategy shows the stance, and knowledge shows the long-term signal — combine all six to guide the user clearly through today.
